creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: man dismounting from horse onto platform at LL, while a woman waiting under verandah greets him; another woman stands at center near a man in short shift who stands with back to viewer; at R, an older man in blue crosses bridge; village scene in background at R, with stream, a bay, grasses, and hills in background
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LRQ; upper center
title: Totsuka, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
